data.text: @bt_uk Looks like it‚Äôs every provider in the area, not just you. üòü
@bt_uk Looks like there are problems here in Durham City üòü

@bt_uk was hoping get connected today. Engineer due between 08:00 and 13:00. Arrived at 19:30 and couldn‚Äôt do the job- and had only been told about half of it anyway. Waited in ALL DAY. üòñüòñ terrible terrible service‚Ä¶.
@bt_uk Is your Wi-Fi down? We have nothing!
@bt_uk Friday night and your ‚Äúunbreakable‚Äù internet is broken! And you won‚Äôt turn on our minihub! 50 quid a month well spent. #unbreakableinternet

Paper spam from @ee, saying if we pay ¬£10 more then we pay now (base rate) we can have shittier vdsl from @Bt_uk. No /29 routed IP, no multi line support as we'd have to use their useless router, no VPN support... Not much of an offer.

@bt_uk Had engineer to install broadband but there was an issue with cabinet connections. I work from home and need it fixed asap, eng told me to call and I did but i dont think anyone understood what I was asking. Kept asking if i had missed the eng appt.. Can you help? Thanks.

@bt_uk Not sure there‚Äôs much point. Just spent half an hour on phone with @bt_uk. I stayed in all afternoon for someone to come look at a fortnight old broadband problem & it‚Äôs not been fixed. @WeAreOpenreach only do daytime weekday visits. Ridiculous there‚Äôs no evening or weekend slots

Why even bother to keep up the pretence that @WeAreOpenreach and @bt_uk are separate companies. They exploit it to avoid customer problems. Our broadband network in the hands of a monopoly like @WeAreOpenreach with no contact number or customer care service is a national disgrace
@bt_uk Thanks Lizzie
@bt_uk lost all he channels again is this going to keep happening?

Well it only took 4 months of waiting, 13+ hours on the phone, a few angry tweets, a complaint to Ofcom and a dozen emails but @bt_uk have finally reconnected me. Huge thanks to Michael in the Consumer Resolution team for achieving this miracle.
@bt_uk That won't work for streaming
@bt_uk That won't work to stream, I can try to
@bt_uk horrible internet connection today in Willesden Green. Any explanation why?! Really frustrated by the continuous interruptions through out the day!
@bt_uk I can't not stream this weekend
@bt_uk There says there is no issues

@bt_uk @bt_uk have replied with details via PM thanks
@bt_uk Is there an outage? Whats going on?
@bt_uk Wednesday won't be good enough. We're already looking at other providers now. Today is Friday.
@bt_uk We have received the updated router that you are rolling out, however the wires provided are not long enough. Can we use the wiring from our existing router for this new one?
@bt_uk Hi we've got no Internet access atall, they said it might not be fixed til Wednesday. Please help? I'm a streamer and can't wait til then.

@bt_uk 
I recieved a text re digital phone upgrade,it gives a number or link to request an adapter,the text is a premium number and the link goes to Skype??

@bt_uk Thanks I've done that. This is the hub I already have, it's got a WAN port and was supplied with an FTTP installation over two years ago. I don't need, don't want and didn't ask for an identical one. That comes under "unsolicited goods" and I'm not paying for it or returning it. https://t.co/5YGcjSEC38
@bt_uk Thank you for coming back to me. Glenda from your customer services has been in touch and is helping me.
@bt_uk erm can you guys work please been down for 4 hours now
@bt_uk Have sent a DM as requested
@MarcAllera @BTAAwards @EE @bt_uk Congrats

@bt_uk My house phone has not worked in a while and I am trying to speak to someone about it but keep getting caught up in your automated bot thing which seems to go round in a loop asking the same question without getting anywhere. I want to speak to a human!! üò°
@bt_uk Thank you to Kate and Elise, BT call takers based in Glasgow (I think) 10/10 for great customer service today, please pass this on, from Jacqueline.

@bt_uk what‚Äôs the complaint email address, why do @bt_uk make it difficult and endless to raise an issue ? When called on endless queue and when online keep redirecting to help to call. Otherwise normal mail really ?

@bt_uk Why is BT wifi network having problems?

@bt_uk Thanks. It's still the same my end
@SAFCsharpy @SAFCSpencer @bt_uk Haway man sort tf out!
@bt_uk how much notice do I need to give to cancel broadband from the end of my current contract? And how do I do this?

@bt_uk The freebies and weak signal that we were assured would be going digital in feb so it wasn‚Äôt a problem. Then we were given a different number to call who want more money. We‚Äôve been told we will be getting a ¬£40 call out charge off our bill every month and it hasn‚Äôt come off

@bt_uk signed up to BT in December - BIGGEST mistake of my life. Still no TV - appalling signal - being charged incorrectly AND no one is listening when I call up. Fobbed off constantly. Absolute joke.

@bt_uk my Wifi hasn‚Äôt been up for an entire month, today. Support keep blowing me off but this has had a major financial effect on me. I expect this to be sorted within this week, and I expect to be compensated heavily. If this does not happen then I shall be seeking legal advice
@bt_uk Not on an open channel
@bt_uk Thank you ‚ò∫Ô∏è will send through now
Yet another frustrating phone call with @bt_uk 45 minutes on the phone and still no closer to sorting out my home move. Been told to phone again tomorrow ü§£. Rubbish service! Will be leaving ASAP

@bt_uk Hi BT! I‚Äôve just had another text & email saying that you‚Äôve not received my kit return and I am soon to be charged. This was posted on 4th March and Royal Mail tracking confirms delivery on 7th March. How long until I receive confirmation of receipt by yourselves please?
@bt_uk Just sent DM
@bt_uk Yep - I can't remember what it did but it didn't resolve anything. Probably best to ask Norton to fix their bug rather than ask me to find a workaround : )
@bt_uk Well, someone was meant to call between 10am and 12pm but didn't. No Internet for second day now.
@bt_uk https://t.co/t9rvQinor5
@bt_uk @aseddon9463 They are useless and over priced‚Ä¶we have left them and stream ufc

Your guys caused all sorts of issues with my account a while back and access has never been easy since.

@bt_uk We have already placed the order with BT. Openreach came today and installed the fibre cable on the out side of the house and we got an appointment on the 8th April to connect everything up on the inside.
@bt_uk I am. But I have various log ins which may be the issue.
@bt_uk Ok thanks. No harm in trying. The ¬£50 voucher and the two new Essentials Digital Phones make up for it.

@virginmedia have been digging up the pavements all over Southall since January. Many grey junction boxes have appeared some roads have more then one @bt_uk only have one on each road! Some of these Virgin boxes have been placed on kerbside of pavement why? Unwitting drivers will https://t.co/lST7ktxuv3

@bt_uk Hi, TalkTalk have been in contact offering us a deal to stay with them which is cheaper than the BT order we are switching to. Is there any chance of reducing the monthly cost of the package I have on order?

@bt_uk ^Dee Started the phone call with contents of that email / date / time and after 1 hour I was none the wiser. It says go to Your BT and add it under Partner Content. I attached screenshot. There is nothing.

@bt_uk Matthew, your colleague on the customer service phone line, was really helpful. 35 mins on phone in the end. 

He's arranged so I can ring tomorrow for an "expedited appointment".

Fingers crossed we get broadband eventually.

I'm reminded of this song https://t.co/fTmUWk2Obq

@bt_uk My Full Fibre 900 got activated on 22nd however I cannot find a way to get 12months @xboxuk Game pass that should be available under Your Products. 1 hour on phone and was sent to Xbox CS for who knows what https://t.co/YR1AgR9PoT
@bt_uk nope its just a serie a game

Bless, the guy on the other end's being super helpful. I've been on the phone for 25 minutes, on hold for most of that, but he keeps apologising for the delay.

I know you're trying, @bt_uk , and I'm trying not to be a Karen about it!

tweets.text: @Bob__Hudson Not so good Bob, keep a check on the tracker and it'll keep you updated on the progress. Should the tracker show the fault as cleared and if you're still having bother restart your Hub, if still the same let us know. ^Dom
@Bob__Hudson Hi Bob, sorry to hear you're having bother. Can you check https://t.co/gqud2yQZpH to see if there is anything going on in your area which we're aware of? ^Dom

@stephytreas Hi Stephanie 
Is it the ethernet cable that you need? You can use your old one ^Lizzie
@WhozThatGirlttv Sorry again Jessica, we won't know what the fault is until the engineer goes out to investigate. Are you able to connect to BT wifi? ^Lesley
@WhozThatGirlttv Take a look on this link Jessica: https://t.co/gqud2yQZpH ^Catherine

Some BT cabinets on the streets of Sheffield (@bt_uk /@WeAreOpenreach) along with other pieces of 'street furniture' have become pieces of #StreetArt focusing on local heritage.

This one features local cutler Stan Shaw.

Location: Dun Street, #Sheffield
Artist: Katy Sett https://t.co/raRtTMiGbj

@WhozThatGirlttv I am sorry Jessica, but it would be the same with other providers. We can only give you the first available appointment. If this is a network fault and no appointment made, then Openreach will be working to get you reconnected as soon as possible. ^Catherine
@GingerGenius78 Hi I am really sorry to hear this, please PM me with the BT account details so we can take a look at the account notes for a further understanding on this matter. Thanks ^Aled
@WhozThatGirlttv Hi Jessica, I am sorry to see this. We always offer the first available appointment to our customers. ^Catherine
